content: I don't have personal preferences, but i can suggest a few popular weathered songs that have resonated with many listeners. "lying in wait" is a haunting and emotional track that showcases the band's ability to create a melancholic atmosphere with poignant lyrics and atmospheric instrumentals. "do you remember" is another popular song that features passionate vocals and heartfelt lyrics about the pain and struggles of a relationship. "i'm okay" is a more uplifting track that showcases the band's ability to blend introspective lyrics with a catchy and upbeat melody. these songs are just a few examples of the emotional and introspective sound of weathered, and they may be a good starting point for someone new to the band.
